message.body: So glad to be done with Arabic
dude, seriously. i already gave away my flashcards to some of my boo's friends that are taking it next year.
the freshman. he's not really my boo, haha. i wish. speaking of which, don't you get to see yours so soon? when are you going home?
ahh, so exciting! you must be dying/hardcore counting down.
Loo been counting down since spring break
hahaha, naturally. i'm going home on the 9th, but the freshman is leaving on monday. it's like mildly disconcerting to think that last night was probably my last night ever with him.
Or you could just ask him out..
nope. i really think it's just a fwb thing for him. and it might still be for me. idk.
Okay, well you never know. Maybe some senior or junior will transfer to Emory and become your habibi
that would be awesome. some super cute, smart junior. and tall.
